provisions.content:

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3. Every person who shall be present at, or attend any Training at
such meeting or assembly, for the purpose of training or
drilling any other person or persons to the use of arms, or
the practice of military exercise, movements, or evolutions,
or who shall train or drill any other person or persons to
the use of arms or the practice of military exercise,
movements, or evolutions, or who shall aid or assist therein,
being legally convicted thereof, shall be liable to be ~ ~ ~ 1 ~ ; .
imprisoned for a term not exceeding seven years, with or
without hard labour.
